Generates an invoice based on provided instructions.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["instruction"],"properties":{"instruction":{"type":"string","example":"Create an invoice from Jane Doe to Chimoney Incorporated for Web Dev Service which I provided for 4 months at $5/month and for Project Management cost of $100 with tax rate of 5%."}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Success","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string","example":"Successful invoice generation"},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"invoiceNumber":{"type":"string","example":"invoice_2025_123_web_project"},"invoiceDate":{"type":"string","format":"date","example":"2025-08-24"},"sender":{"type":"object","properties":{"firstName":{"type":"string","example":"John"},"lastName":{"type":"string","example":"Doe"}}},"recipient":{"type":"object","properties":{"companyName":{"type":"string","example":"Chimoney Incorporated"},"addressLine1":{"type":"string","example":"Web Dev Service"},"email":{"type":"string","example":"chimoneyapi@gmail.com"}}}}}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - Error in the request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string","example":"error"},"type":{"type":"string","example":"Validation Error"},"code":{"type":"string","example":"INVALID_REQUEST"},"message":{"type":"string","example":"\"instruction\" is required"}}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - Invalid API key","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string","example":"unauthorized access"},"error":{"type":"string","example":"Oops! You need to a valid Chimoney User ID to do that."}}}}}},"403":{"description":"Forbidden - Access to this request is forbidden.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string"},"error":{"type":"string","example":"Access to this resource is forbidden."}}}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal Server Error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string"},"type":{"type":"string"},"code":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string","example":"Oops! An internal error has occured. Give us a few minutes to set things right."}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
